central_thesis: Psychic Development 2 is a practical weekend workshop designed to advance students in perceiving, feeling, and manipulating subtle energy fields, such as auras and magnetic energies. It expands upon foundational techniques like visualization, telepathy, meditation, and dream interpretation, integrating Eastern concepts of energy anatomy with Western magical practices to enable practical applications in healing, protection, and conscious influence.

structure_content.summary: This section provides an overview of the weekend's content, addresses questions from Psychic Development 1, and focuses on practical exercises for seeing, evaluating, and feeling one's own and others' auras. It introduces concepts of protection and the creation/programming of thoughtforms.

This section covers progressive relaxation leading to chakra meditation, techniques for sending healing energy, and raising/programming a 'cone of power'. Practical exercises include telepathy for cloud breaking and sending thoughtforms. Students learn health scans, receive a psychic attunement to enhance energy flow, and are assigned homework involving feeling elemental representatives and partner-based telepathy/health readings.

structure_content.chapter_title: 3rd Section: Advanced Aura Work and Dream Analysis
structure_content.summary: This section reviews homework, delves into dream analysis, revisits chakra meditation and the cone of power. It includes viewing a crown center mandala and further practice in seeing, enlarging, and shrinking the aura.

This section focuses on relaxation with earth energy, advanced aura feeling and reading, and '1-10 progressive relaxation'. It introduces programming for specific timelines (one month and one year). Homework involves long-distance viewing for placement/contents of envelopes and group dreaming with an 'Omni dream experiment' in preparation for the P3 workshop.

key_concepts.definition: A weekend course designed to teach students to perceive, feel, and read subtle energy fields (auras, magnetic energies), building upon and extending techniques from Psychic Development 1.
Invisible energetic emanations such as auras and other magnetic energies, which are the focus of perception and manipulation in this course.
An energy field surrounding an individual, which can be perceived, felt, evaluated, enlarged, shrunk, and interpreted, often through color associations.
A mental construct that can be consciously produced and programmed to serve specific purposes or intentions.

Centers of consciousness located in the astral body, with corresponding nerve vortexes and ductless glands in the physical body. They are conduits for universal energy (prana) and their balance affects physical and energetic health.
An energetic body, distinct from the physical, where the chakras are located and through which energy (prana) flows via Astral Tubes.
Tube-like energetic pathways in the astral body that transport energy. Major examples include Ida, Pingala, and Sushumna.
Eastern names for two astral tubes located on either side of the spine, through which energy commonly moves in most people. Imbalance in their flow can lead to illness.
The most important astral tube, centrally located, whose physical counterpart is the spinal nerve complex. Yogis channel energy through Sushumna to achieve heightened consciousness.
A latent spiritual energy, described as 'coiled & waiting' at the base of the spine, which 'rises' when successfully channeled through the Sushumna, leading to heightened consciousness.
An energetic construct or field that can be consciously raised and programmed for specific magical or energetic work.
A process designed to increase and enhance the flow of psychic or subtle energy within an individual.

A system of associating specific colors with energetic properties, chakra centers, emotional states, and practical applications (e.g., Red: Root center, sex, energy; Green: Heart center, universal love, healing; Purple: Strongest protection, higher guidance).

practical_system.description: The system presented is an experiential, sequential training methodology for cultivating and applying psychic and energetic abilities. It combines meditative practices, visualization, direct energy manipulation, and practical exercises to enhance perception of subtle energy fields (auras, chakras) and to develop active manipulation skills for healing, protection, and influencing reality (e.g., thoughtforms, cone of power). The curriculum builds upon prior knowledge, integrating both theoretical understanding and hands-on application through guided exercises and homework assignments, often involving partner work.
tools: The practitioner's own energetic anatomy (aura, chakras, astral tubes)
Conscious mind for visualization and intention
Colors (for aura interpretation and energetic application)
Mandala (specifically the crown center mandala for visualization/focus)
Partners (for telepathy and energy exchange exercises)
rituals: Raising and programming the cone of power
Practice seeing, feeling, evaluating, enlarging, and shrinking auras
Receiving a psychic attunement for energy flow
Telepathy exercises (e.g., breaking up cloud groups, sending thought forms, reading partners for health issues)
Feeling the representatives of the four elements

relevant_quotes.text: Psychic Development 2 is a weekend course designed to teach students to perceive, feel & read subtle energy fields such as auras & other forms of magnetic energies.
The Chakras are centers of consciousness into and out of which universal energy, or prana, flows.

The SUSHUMNA, whose physical counterpart is the spinal nerve complex itself. It is this TUBE thru which YOGIS seek to channel their energy, which serves to heighten consciousness beyond the level we usually operate on.
When a YOGI has succeeded in raising energy thru this TUBE we say his 'Kundalini' has risen.
A black aura is very bad.
If in doubt use WHITE. Always spiritual.
Use [Purple] for the strongest protection, to draw energy to you from the highest levels and tune into higher guidance.

critical_analysis.relevance: This document, an outline for 'Psychic Development 2,' is highly relevant for practitioners interested in a structured approach to cultivating psychic and energetic abilities. It provides a syllabus that blends foundational esoteric concepts (Chakras, Astral Body, Kundalini) from Eastern traditions with practical Western magical and psychic techniques (aura manipulation, thoughtforms, energy healing, telepathy, power cones). Its emphasis on experiential learning, practical exercises, and homework makes it a valuable guide for those seeking to develop operative skills in subtle energy work.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The course is explicitly designed for 'intermediate & advanced students' of psychic development. A prerequisite of 'Psychic Development 1 or its equivalent' is recommended, implying a foundational understanding of basic psychic principles, visualization, meditation, telepathy, and dream interpretation. It caters to individuals committed to hands-on practice and personal energetic exploration, aiming for practical application of esoteric knowledge for healing, protection, and conscious influence.
